Combat Notes:

Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +3
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +3
Strength Attack Adjustment: +1
Strength Damage Adjustment: +1
Toughness: +20 HP
Improved Uncanny Dodge: Cannot be flanked, sneak attack only by rogue level 24+
Lookout: When adjacent ally has same feat, may take move and standard actions in surprise round if both self and ally can act; if only ally can act, self gains surprise round action after ally
Lunge: May suffer -2 AC to gain +5' melee range
Master Strike: Sneak attack inflicts choice of sleep, paralysis, or death (DC 21 Fort neg)
Sickening Critical: Critical hit inflicts sickened for 1 min
Snap Shot: May make ranged attack at Initiative 20 during surprise round
Sneak Attack: Hit inflicts +10d6 HP when foe flanked or denied Dexterity bonus
Stand Up: May stand from prone as free action
Stealthy Sniper: Reduces sniping Stealth penalty to -10
Uncanny Dodge: Always adds Dexterity modifier to AC (foe feint neg)

Dexterity Reflex Adjustment: +3
Iron Will: +2 Will
Wisdom Will Adjustment: -1
Evasion: Reflex save yields no damage instead of half
Slippery Mind: May attempt second save vs. enchantment in next rd
